title: Tricks
description:
Mark Redmond, Aditya Surendran and DJ Crystal Clear share stories about arson, pyramid schemes and one badass mother.
Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Quincy Jones, Aditya Surendran, Lucinda Williams, DJ Crystal Clear, Mark Redmond, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, James Brown)
